title: Enga Pora Lyrics Madha Yaanai Koottam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Enga Pora
Singer(s): Thanjai Selvi
Music: N.R.Raghunanthan
Lyricist: Ekadasi
Movie: Madha Yaanai Koottam (2013)

Enga pora maganey, nee enga poramaganey
oora vittu pora ne thaai vera vittu pora
Sandaala ganamey, vittu poraadhu un inamey
irukudhu ettu dhesai, ne poradhu endha dhesa

Sirippai marandhaai, chinnadhaaga irandhaai
unaku marundhaai irukiraal oru thaai
kuthi vacha arisi thaan ulayila kidakudhu
pethu potta vairuthaan
pathikittu eriyudhu ...(Enga pora maganey..)

Nerupula padardhirichi,
pethavalin madi piriyum.
perundhyar nadandiriche,
soru ootum sondham bandham
soolchiyaaga pesiriche,
ver arukka saadhi sanam
vettaruvaa veesirichey.

Enna idhu unnaku
idi mattum kanakku
saadhisanam edhuku
saamiyum dhaan edhukku.
veyila somandhu
viththukittu poravanga..
iruta paaipol
surikittu povadhengae ...(Enga pora maganey..)

Valithuna illaama
vanavaasam povadhu pol
karai illaa nadhiyaatam
kandhaa neeyum poradhengae.

Kal vilundha kulam pola
kalangiruchey un polappu
poo vilundha kanna pola
poyirichey un polappu.

nenjukuzhi oram pacha kuthi ponen
pachakili onnu kathukittu kidakku
chellamey, chediye, chengaattu
chiththiramey.
mullaye, kodiye, upparathu
vazhi neeye.

Enga pora maganey, nee enga poramaganey
oora vittu pora ne thaai vera vittu pora
Sandaala ganamey, vittu poraadhu un inamey
irukudhu ettu dhesai, ne poradhu endha dhesa
